page.title: 15FARMS AROUND WOOLRIDGE
page.content: CROFT FARM Mr Morris has 42 acres of fruit trees and also keeps pigs on 12 fields of grassland near Hartpury. He grows plums for sale locally and apples for a cider company and for a mincemeat factory. OVERTON FARM This is a mixed arable and beef farm owned by Mr Bubb. It covers 220 acres of sloping land next to the A417. His cattle are Herefords, worth 150 pounds when 1 week old and 500 pounds at 12 months. Last year's wheat crop was sold to the EEC and stored in a hangar at Staverton Airport because of a surplus. CHARGY HILL FARM The owner, Mrs Williams, leases most of her 95 acre farm to tenants who put beef cattle on it because it is high and dry land. It is mostly rough graz- ing, with one small orchard.
